TopicTitle: Kerbals at War - The very first KSP War movie

Articles.Content: One of the moderators mentioned this would not be stickied forever

One of the moderators mentioned this would not be stickied forever

Makes sense, I wasn't ever expecting it to be stickied in the first place. The response is surprisingly overwhleming.

I'd also like to apologise to HarvesteR and the rest of the devs for probably receiving a giant flood of poorly worded requests for "gnus an muitlplayer and enemy kerbrels" shortly after I published this.
are you the IL-2 video guy ? (sorry, isnt quite precise ) anyways,well done, except i miss huge NUKE launchers, topols and titans pls
That's pretty old, but still good work!

If you don't mind, could you post a picture of the VTOL without any of the panels on it... since I know you don't post the .craft files, I am trying to replicate it for myself(only for myself, I won't post it unless that's ok). Of course, if you don't want me to, that's fine. Also, along with a cutaway, maybe you could post some other purdy pictures of it with the panels still on... or off, I just need to know the insides and outs of the whole thing So if you could do that, that would be great!
Actually, Squad is working on a multiplayer right now, but it won't come out soon.
